name: Path of Reflection
description:
Help both aliens reach the center to escape the planet!

Move the left character with W,A,S,D or the arrow keys. The right character will move in the opposite direction. Both characters must occupy the center tile at the same time. If you get stuck, press R to reset the current level!

This game was created in under 3 hours for the TriJam #69 game jam (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-69).  

All assets are from this asset pack https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1

Music courtesy of http://www.nihilore.com/
